meta.description: Determine the maximum amount of cargo that can be transported from Hub 0 to Hub 5 per day without surpassing road weight limits.

sets.name: HUBS
sets.description: Set of cargo hubs in the transportation network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum cargo capacity in tons for each road between hubs.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Amount of cargo flow in tons between hubs.

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total cargo flow from Hub 0 to Hub 5.

constraints.name: capacity_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Hub 0 to Hub 1 must not exceed capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_0_2
constraints.description: Flow from Hub 0 to Hub 2 must not exceed capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_0_3
constraints.description: Flow from Hub 0 to Hub 3 must not exceed capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_0_4
constraints.description: Flow from Hub 0 to Hub 4 must not exceed capacity.

constraints.name: capacity_0_5
constraints.description: Flow from Hub 0 to Hub 5 must not exceed capacity.

constraints.description: Flow from Hub 1 to Hub 5 must not exceed capacity.
